name: LIF (Life is fragile)
description:
Life is fragile. You are an ambulance driver. Don't let your patient die on the highway to the hospital.

This is my entry to godot wild jam, theme: "Fragile". (I didn't have much time to work on it, all was done in about ~1 day...).

Assets:

Beautiful heart Darsycho: https://opengameart.org/content/beating-heart-0

Hospital - Chasersgaming/ https://opengameart.org/content/sprite-city-series-1-hospital

map/cars Kenney car-kit/tiles https://www.kenney.nl/assets

sfx/JerichoDesigns https://freesound.org/people/JerichoDesigns/sounds/625477/

music/Kikomonzon https://freesound.org/people/Kikomonzon/sounds/561021/
